title: Converge
description: Converge is making jobsites smarter by using the latest in artificial intelligence and sensor data collection. Our flagship product ConcreteDNA is a concrete data platform that gives real time concrete strength data and AI curing predictions, optimising the concreting cycle by up to 30%. It's powered by Converge Signal, an embedded concrete sensor system that transmits curing data to the cloud wirelessly.   This allows construction companies to strike earlier, maximise productivity, and plan their projects more efficiently.
